about_the_game:
NOTE: this is a "demo" but it's more like an open beta. not everything is super polished yet!

cute (but tough) turn-based card tactics autobattler!! predict what will happen -> play cards to change the outcome -> find out if yer as smart as you think you are, pardner. turn the tables on them interlopers — don't let 'em get to The Gulch!

  • over 50 unique jobs with their own cards and special abilities (20 available in the demo)
  • jobs have cards associated with them that comprise your deck
  • play the right cards at the right times to beat the odds and win the battle
  • pay attention to positioning and try to anticipate how the battle will play out, then change the outcome with your cards
  • build powerful teams based on complex synergies -- or just fill your team with Cactus people and try to make it work

name: Gulch Guardians Demo
